title: Billing & Plans
text:
- Subscriptions renew monthly on the purchase date.
- Usage resets at the start of each billing cycle.

title: Billing & Plans
text:
- If payment fails, the account enters "past due" immediately.
- After 3 days past due, access is limited to Free plan features.
- After 14 days past due, the subscription is canceled.

title: Billing & Plans
text:
- Upgrades take effect immediately; the plan price is prorated for the remaining billing cycle.
- Downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle renewal date.

title: Incident Response
text:
- "Service unavailable" means API and web app are inaccessible for most users.
- An incident is "confirmed" when on-call has validated it and posted a status update.

title: Incident Response
text:
1. Detect and triage
2. Mitigate impact
3. Communicate status updates
4. Post-incident review (PIR) within 5 business days

title: Incident Response
text: - If a confirmed incident causes service unavailability longer than 24 hours, partial refunds may be issued per the Refund Policy.

title: Privacy Policy Summary
text:
- Account email
- Billing details handled by payment processor
- Usage metadata (timestamps, feature usage)

title: Privacy Policy Summary
text:
- Free: 7 days
- Pro: 30 days
- Team: 90 days

title: Privacy Policy Summary
text:
- Uploaded documents may be used to provide the service.
- Customer content is not sold to third parties.

title: Refund Policy
text:
- Pro and Team plans are eligible for refunds within 14 days of the initial purchase.
- Refunds apply only to first-time subscriptions (first purchase on an account).

title: Refund Policy
text:
- Free plan is non-refundable.
- Add-on seats purchased mid-cycle are non-refundable.
- Usage-based overages (if enabled) are non-refundable.

title: Refund Policy
text:
- If the service is unavailable due to a confirmed incident lasting more than 24 hours, partial refunds may be issued at AcmeAI's discretion.
- Refund requests may be denied if there is evidence of abuse (see Fair Use policy).

title: Refund Policy
text: - Contact support with the subject "Refund Request" and include the account email and purchase date.

title: Security Policy
text:
- Team plan supports SSO.
- Admins must enable MFA for all Team admins.
- Passwords must be at least 12 characters.

title: Security Policy
text:
- Customer documents uploaded to the service are encrypted at rest.
- Access to production data is restricted to on-call engineers and security team members.

title: Security Policy
text:
- Report security issues to security@acmeai.example (do not post publicly).
- We aim to respond within 72 hours.

title: Security Policy
text: - Intentional misuse of access privileges may result in termination of access and account cancellation.

title: Support Policy
text:
- Free: community forum only
- Pro: email support (response target: 48 business hours)
- Team: priority email support (response target: 24 business hours)

title: Support Policy
text:
Support covers:
- billing issues, login/access, product bugs, and usage questions

Support does not cover:
- custom model training
- writing prompts for you
- legal advice

title: Support Policy
text: Refund requests must follow the Refund Policy and may be denied for Fair Use violations.

title: Terms of Service Summary
text:
- You must follow the Usage Limits & Fair Use policy.
- You may not attempt to bypass rate limits or access controls.

title: Terms of Service Summary
text:
- AcmeAI may terminate accounts for repeated policy violations.
- Termination due to abuse may impact refund eligibility (see Refund Policy).

title: Usage Limits & Fair Use
text:
- Free: 20 requests/day
- Pro: 2,000 requests/month
- Team: 12,000 requests/month shared across seats

title: Usage Limits & Fair Use
text:
Abuse includes:
- Automated scraping at high frequency
- Attempts to bypass limits
- Sharing Team seats outside the organization

title: Usage Limits & Fair Use
text:
- First violation: warning email and temporary rate limit (1 request/10 seconds) for 24 hours.
- Second violation: account suspended for 7 days.
- Third violation: account termination.

title: Usage Limits & Fair Use
text: - Accounts flagged for abuse are not eligible for refunds.
